title: Client bug...
body:
I open a game like normaly and we lock-in the champions we want, then when  we are on our way into the loading sceen it does not open at all. Even if I close my client  and start it again it's just in the normal client(where you can see your friends and stuff) saying "Game is still in progress"... :c
{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: A lot of people are having this same problem. I myself got stuck in relative elo hell for 2 weeks or so because I lost LP due to this. Riot definitely needs to fix this, but in the meantime the solution to this is to open your task manager and kill both the game and the client then relaunch the client.
